entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 10 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 10 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 6 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023
